description: Standardized baking ingredients catalogue v3 - comprehensive reference

ingredients.description: All-purpose wheat flour (aka AP flour|plain flour)
Gluten-free flour blend (aka GF flour blend)
Sugar, brown light (aka light brown sugar)
Sugar, brown dark (aka dark brown sugar)
Corn syrup, light (aka light corn syrup)
Corn syrup, dark (aka dark corn syrup)
Peanut butter, smooth (aka smooth peanut butter)
Peanut butter, crunchy (aka crunchy peanut butter)
Milk, condensed sweetened (aka sweetened condensed milk)
Milk powder, nonfat (aka nonfat dry milk)
Milk powder, whole (aka whole milk powder)
Yeast, active dry (aka active dry yeast)
Chocolate chips, semi-sweet (aka semi sweet chips)
Chocolate chips, bittersweet (aka dark chocolate chips)
Chocolate chips, milk (aka milk chocolate chips)
Chocolate chips, white (aka white chocolate chips)
Mini chocolate chips, semi-sweet (aka mini chips)
Chocolate, baking semi-sweet (aka semi sweet baking chocolate)
Chocolate, baking bittersweet (aka bittersweet baking chocolate)
Chocolate, baking milk (aka milk baking chocolate)
Coconut, shredded sweetened (aka sweetened shredded coconut)
Coconut, shredded unsweetened (aka unsweetened shredded coconut)
Vinegar, apple cider (aka apple cider vinegar)
Powdered milk, malted (aka malted milk powder)
Rice cereal, crisp (aka crispy rice cereal)
Walnuts (generic - see walnuts_halves, walnuts_chopped for specific)
Pecans (generic - see pecans_halves, pecans_chopped for specific)
